title: Countryside themed skins?
body:
I've been thinking about this for a while.
We already have Hillbilly Gragas and Lumberjack Sion, so why not add more skins for a countryside feel?
Mad Sickle Diana, Hillbilly Darius and Shepherd Nasus (he could have him tweaked to look like a German shepherd in shepherd clothing, while holding a shepherd staff)

Plz gib opinions :)
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Or farmer nasus. You know, because he farms. I:
